name: Color Cannon
description:
My submission for the Mid-Jam game jam 2021.

Objective: Get as many hexagons to be absorbed by the square. The square only absorbs hexagons that are the same color as the square. 

You can change the color of a hexagon by selecting a color on the bottom left corner, aiming your mouse toward the hexagon, and then left clicking to shoot a color ball. If the ball hits the hexagon, the hexagon will change colors. 

Your score increases if the square absorbs a hexagon(that is the same color as the square). You lose a life if a differently colored hexagon collides with the square, or if a hexagon goes past the square. 

Controls: 

Move square up: W or Up Arrow

Move square down: S or Down Arrow

Shoot: Left click

Use red balls: 1

Use orange balls: 2

Use green balls: 3

Use blue balls: 4

Select color to the right: D or Left Arrow

Select color to the left: A or Right Arrow

Pause: Escape
